'''Radiant Spincrystal 39''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[The Fading Stories]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located off of the town center of [[Qingce Village]], hiding behind some barrels.
